name: Pixel Horde
description:
You have one minute before the horde arrives... survive as long as you can.

This is my first game, in both development and publishing. It is very crude and rough for that reason.

I am an aspiring game developer and I would appreciate any comments that will help me grow and progress as a developer.

RMB: Shoot

Shift: Sprint

WASD: Move

ESC: Exit to Menu

Music by: Canton

Found at www.sampleswap.org

Song Name: Lewd Day

Made in Gamemaker: Studio
